author: camolezi
body:
#### PR description:
Replaced boost::bind for std::bind.
Removed unused headers.
The code should have the same behavior.

#### PR validation:
Passed on basic runTheMatrix test.

title: Reduce boost dependency in RecoTracker/TkDetLayers
